headline: Dollar Tree (DLTR) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Volatility
summary: What Dollar Tree’s recent performance data tells you Dollar Tree (DLTR) has been on many investors’ radars after a mixed run in recent months, with short term share price weakness contrasting with stronger total returns over the past year. See our latest analysis for Dollar Tree. At a share price of US$117.31, Dollar Tree has seen short term share price pressure, including a 7 day share price return decline of 7.48%. Its 1 year total shareholder return of 57.46% and 90 day share price return...
